name: Noel Dockstader
introduction: Producer/Director Noel Dockstader began his documentary career in the UK, where he worked for leading independent production companies October Films and Diverse Productions. His UK credits include Show Runner/Director of several Discovery Channel series: Warrior Women, a popular history series hosted by Lucy Lawless of Xena, Warrior Princess fame, Hero Factor, exploring the science of sudden acts of heroism, and Trailblazers, a 13-part series following the adventures of scientists and journalists in some of the most dangerous regions of the globe.Previous work for National Geographic Television include Taboo, Supercoasters,  Bigfoot, and Monsters of the Deep. He was also a Senior Producer/Show Runner for 26 episodes of Out There, National Geographic Channel’s flagship adventure science series.
